description: In this canvas, women of varying ages appear to go about daily life within a colorful, stylized outdoor environment. Like much of Gauguin's work, the composition combines observed detail with artistic fantasy to create a dreamlike scene that resists simple interpretation. Its deliberately provocative title enhances this effect, leaving us to wonder if the “you” refers to someone in the painting or to the viewer.
title: No te aha oe riri (Why Are You Angry?)
